description:
We are a Quality Fast growing dental lab looking for an office assistant. No experience necessary!
It is a very fast paced environment with tight deadlines!
Duties will include but are not limited to:

 Answering phones
 Unpacking/disinfecting dental cases as they arrive
 Packing cases for delivery
 Organizing deliveries
 Data entry
 Keeping lab organized with cases coming out
 Attention to detail is an absolute must!
 Computer skills a must
 Ability to multitask efficiently
 Punctual
 Pleasant phone mannerism
 Work well as a part of our team or individually
 No experience necessary, we are willing to train the right person

Hours are Monday to Friday, no weekends!
Benefits, bonuses, plenty of on site-parking! If this sounds like it could be a good fit for you, please forward your resume.
Hours are Monday to Friday, no weekends!
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Benefits:

 Casual dress
 Dental care
 Extended health care
 On-site parking
 Wellness program

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Education:

 Secondary School (preferred)

Work Location: In person
